title: UNDER WATER VEL'KOZ :O
body:
So I cant believe this isn't a thing yet but any ways, An under water Vel'koz skin :D.
Its following threshs and chogaths theme of underwater or sea creature or what ever, except he is an octopus  and his ultimate is like hydropump... (pokemon). and his q can be a reef or something.
Tell me what you think!

replies.body: I would love a water themed skin for Vel'Koz. I think this is a good idea :){{champion:161}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
